name: smart-product-event-service
description: The event microservice for the smart product solution

scripts.pretest: rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.build:init: rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build:init && npm install --production && npm run build:zip && npm run build:dist
scripts.local:depfix: npm run build:init && npm install && rm -rf ./node_modules/authorizer && rm -rf ./node_modules/logger && rm -rf ./node_modules/utils && cp -R ../../../resources/authorizer ./node_modules/authorizer && cp -R ../../../resources/logger ./node_modules/logger && cp -R ../../../resources/utils ./node_modules/utils
scripts.local:api: npm run test && npm run local:depfix && sam local start-api --env-vars ../../tests/env-vars.json
